class utils.framework.Framework[source]¶

Bases: object

get_opt(key)[source]¶
load_configs()[source]¶

Load variables from .properties configuration files. If local_execution is true in local_config file, function return both local config dict and server confgi dict. Otherwise function returns only server config dict.

Returns:list with config dictionaries
Raises:ValueError – if config path does not exist
